title: TOP FLOOR STUDIO in Inner Richmond 2nd Ave @ Clement!
posting_body: This cozy studio apartment located in the heart of Inner Richmond is now available!
This unit is located in a small quiet 10 unit building, steps away from restaurants, coffee shops, banks, Golden Gate Park, Presidio National Park and Golf Course, and Laurel Village/Jordan Park!
Beautiful upgrades throughout include wood floors and refinished kitchen cabinets.
Inviting and functional open floorplan features good natural light and oversized window.
Large walk-in closet and a hallway coat closet provides ample storage space.
The bathroom is clean and functional with built-ins for toiletries.
Easy to show, by appointment only.
Ready for immediate move in or by 8/6/2022.
